html:
C++ for Engines

You will explore how to make truly efficient systems within a commercial engine structure utilising both C++ and visual scripting. Completing this module will give you a keen understanding of how programmers can make systems that designers can easily work with without tangling your code

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Transpose systems made by designers into efficient C++ implementations

+  Implement solutions to create gameplay using C++ in Unreal Engine

+  Write technical documentation that communicates system design effectively

+  Evaluate how well a game mechanic has been made, referencing industry practices

Module Content:
